front.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Shipboard Electrical Installations - Systems Engineering

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: IEEE 45 has grown due to new technology and methods. As a result, the document has been divided into a base document (IEEE 45) and eight sub-documents IEEE 45.1 through IEEE 45.8. This document addresses the recommended practice for systems engineering and integration of shipboard electric systems installations.
